summary.content: The long-awaited Firefox 1.5 is now available, as well as a new Mozilla.com site. You can download the new release from Mozilla.com, or if the servers are overloaded, you can get them from Skyzyx: Downloads. Firefox 1.5 for Windows Firefox 1.5 for Mac OS X

content.html:
The long-awaited Firefox 1.5 is now available, as well as a new Mozilla.com site.

You can download the new release from Mozilla.com, or if the servers are overloaded, you can get them from Skyzyx: Downloads.

  • Firefox 1.5 for Windows
  • Firefox 1.5 for Mac OS X
content.plain:
The long-awaited Firefox 1.5 is now available, as well as a new Mozilla.com site.
You can download the new release from Mozilla.com, or if the servers are overloaded, you can get them from Skyzyx: Downloads.
 Firefox 1.5 for Windows Firefox 1.5 for Mac OS X
content.source:
The long-awaited Firefox 1.5 is now available, as well as a new [Mozilla.com]({{% wayback "http://www.mozilla.com" %}}) site.

You can download the new release from [Mozilla.com]({{% wayback "http://www.mozilla.com" %}}), or if the servers are overloaded, you can get them from Skyzyx: Downloads.

* [Firefox 1.5 for Windows]({{% wayback "http://downloads.skyzyx.com/Software/Windows/Modern%20Web%20Browsers/Mozilla%20Firefox%201.5.exe" %}})
* [Firefox 1.5 for Mac OS X]({{% wayback "http://downloads.skyzyx.com/Software/Mac%20OS%20X/Modern%20Web%20Browsers/Mozilla%20Firefox%201.5.dmg" %}})
